column5: Additional details on the decision made by the approver are specified in this @ApprovalStateDetails. This value provides additional machine readable details of @ApprovalState. Hand written comments and notes MAY be specified in ApprovalDetails/Comment.
Details of the person (e.g., a customer, printer or manager) who processed the approval.
This Comment provides a container for human readable notes that are provided by the approver.
The file that contains the approval signature.
